original: Ekstedt, Erik Karl, hovrättsråd, Jönköping, f. 28/1/99 i Värnhem, Skarab. 1., av Carl E. o. Johanna Pettersson. G. 30 m. Wivan Dareng. Barn: Jan Erik f. 31, Leif Erik 36. — Stud:-ex. i Skara 18, jur. kand. i Upps. 22. E. o. not. i Göta hovr. 22, tf. domhav., tjg. i Göta hovr. fr. 25, tf. fiskal där 26, e. o. as’s:e’s^s. 27, asises’s. 32, fiskal 33, tf. rev:sekr. 35, hovr:råd 35, v. ordf. å div. 39. RNO.
translated: Ekstedt, Erik Karl, Court of Appeal Councillor, Jönköping, born on January 28, 1899 in Värnhem, Skaraborg, the first child of Carl E. and Johanna Pettersson. Married on 30th with Wivan Dareng. Children: Jan Erik born in 1931, Leif Erik born in 1936. Completed High School in Skara in 1918, graduated in law from Uppsala University in 1922. Extraordinary Clerk at Göta Court of Appeal in 1922, Acting Judge, employed at Göta Court of Appeal from 1925, Acting Prosecutor there in 1926, Extraordinary Assistant to the Prosecutor General in 1927, Assistant prosecutor in 1932, prosecutor in 1933, Acting Secretary of the Board of Appeal in 1935, appointed Court of Appeal Councillor in 1935, Deputy Chairman of various committees in 1939. He was awarded the Order of Vasa.
